Addon.name: RSS Aggregator
RSS Quick Client
Webcast Add-on
Addon.ArgumentList: Media Link=[]ResourceLink Media Size=Medium-320x240[Small-160x120|Medium-320x240|Large-640x480] Hide Player=[yes]checkbox Auto Start=[yes]checkbox
Addon.OtherHeadTags:
<script src="/plugins/flowplayer-3.1.4.min.js" type="text/javascript"><!-- help ie --></script>
  <script src="/js/jquery.oiplayer.js" type="text/javascript"><!-- help ie --></script>
  <link href="/css/oiplayer.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
  <script type="text/javascript">
  $(document).ready(function() {
      $('body').oiplayer({
          server : 'http://www.openimages.eu', /* msie (or java) has issues with just a dir */
          jar : '/oiplayer/plugins/cortado-ovt-stripped-wm_r38710.jar',
          flash : '/oiplayer/plugins/flowplayer-3.1.5.swf',
          controls : 'top'
      });
  });
  </script>

Field.Name: rssfeeds
Field.Caption: RSS Feeds
Field.HelpDefault: Select the feed(s) which will include this page.

Field.Name: rsstitle
Field.Caption: Title
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The title of the RSS Feed item. If omitted the page name will be used.

Field.Name: rsslink
Field.Caption: RSSLink Override
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) If provided, when someone clicks on this RSS Feed item they will be taken to this link.

Field.Name: rssdateexpire
Field.Caption: Date Expires
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The date when this RSS Feed item expires.

Field.Name: rssdatepublish
Field.Caption: Date Publish
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The date of the RSS Feed Option. If omitted, the date this page was created will be used.

Field.Name: rssdescription
Field.Caption: Description
Field.HelpDefault: (optional) The description of the RSS Feed item.

Field.Name: name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: Aggregator Sources are RSS feeds from other sites that you will display on your site. This is the name of this Aggregator Source. It will not display on your public site.

Field.Name: link
Field.Caption: Link
Field.HelpDefault: This is the URL to the RSS Feed. It generally starts with http:// and ends with the file extension xml.

Field.Name: aggregators
Field.Caption: Aggregators
Field.HelpDefault: Aggregators are groups of Aggregator Sources (Feeds from other sites) that can be displayed together on your site.

Field.Name: name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: Aggregators are groups of RSS Feeds from other sites that will be mixed together and displayed on your site. This is the name for this aggregator. It will not be displayed on the public site.

Field.Name: sources
Field.Caption: Sources
Field.HelpDefault: Aggregator Sources are RSS Feeds from other sites that will be mixed together in this group (Aggregator). To include any of these sources in this aggregator, check the box next to their name. To add more Aggregator Sources, open the list of sources by opening the navigator to Manage Addons - RSS clients and click on RSS Aggregator Sources.

CDef.Name: RSS Feed Newsletter Issue Page Rules

Field.Name: name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The name for this rule. It is not required but can be helpful top locate this rule in a list.

Field.Name: rssfeedid
Field.Caption: RSS Feed
Field.HelpDefault: When selected, this rule only applies to this RSS Feed.

Field.Name: newsletterissuepageid
Field.Caption: Newsletter Story
Field.HelpDefault: When selected, this rule only applies to this Newsletter Story.

Field.Name: name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: The name for your RSS feed. This name will appear within the feed as its caption, as well as on your site in the RSS Feed Link List.

Field.Name: active
Field.Caption: Active
Field.HelpDefault: Mark this feed inactive as a last resort to prevent it from being read by others online.

Field.Name: rssfilename
Field.Caption: RSS Filename
Field.HelpDefault: The filename for your feed. It will be saved in your website in the RSS folder like:http://yourdomain/RSS/RSSFilenamewhere RSSFilename is the string saved in this field.

Field.Name: rssdateupdated
Field.Caption: Last Updated
Field.HelpDefault: The date when this RSS Feed was last updated.

Field.Name: description
Field.Caption: Description
Field.HelpDefault: The description is visible to those subscribed to your feed.

Field.Name: logofilename
Field.Caption: Logo
Field.HelpDefault: Add an image to your feed. This image will appear in the RSS Reader of those subscribed with the descritpion.

Field.Name: link
Field.Caption: Link
Field.HelpDefault: The link to be used for the RSS feed header. This is not for each story, but for the feed itself. You might set it to your site, or to the landing page where you want people to land when they have questions about your feed itself.

Field.Name: copyright
Field.Caption: Copyright
Field.HelpDefault: (Optional) Include copyright information you want to appear in your feed.
